record.field.name: severity
record.file.name: rootcause

brief.brief: Used with initial impact to calculate the priority.
Indicates how pressing an issue is for the initiator.

detail.detail: 1 - Critical: Severe business disruption - The business unit or sub-unit is unable to operate, or a critical system component has failed or is severely impaired.
2 - High: Major business disruption - A critical user or user group is unable to operate, or the business unit is experiencing a significant reduction in system performance.
3 - Average: Minor business disruption - A single user is unable to operate with no available work around.
4 - Low: Minor disruption - A single user or user group is experiencing incidents, but a work around is available, or no direct impact on business.
